mapper.select: select u.user_id as id, u.first_name as firstName, u.last_name as lastName, u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name as name, u.email as email, u.status as status from ideative.user_login_details uld inner join ideative.user u on u.user_id = uld.user_id where uld.access_token = #{accessToken} and uld.end_date is null
